pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Extra Care Instant Volume Powder 10g
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Extra Care Instant Volume Powder is so light and so lasting. It gives you 24-hour hold & unbelievable volume.

Schwarzkopf Extra Care Instant Volume Powder.

Styling Revolution: Powder:

Styling revolution from Extra Care: Instant Volume Powder! Experience the revolutionary Powder Formula. It becomes invisible in seconds, gives instant unbelievable volume and ultra control for your styling.

Instant Volume:

The first Extra Care Styling Powder for instantly visible and long-lasting volume. This unique, weightless formula texturises each hair strand to create maximum volume at the roots, in an instant and without stickiness.

So Light and So Lasting:

Weightless formula for up to 50 applications.

Suitable For: Hair

Size: 10g

Hair Type: Extra Body/Fine

Warnings

Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Aqua, Silica Silylate, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Octylacrylamide/Acrylates/Butylaminoethyl Methacrylate Copolymer.

Directions

Shake a small amount into your palm and rub hands together. Apply on dry hair focusing on the roots and then style as desired.

USAGE ADVICE

For an extra volume boost, shake powder directly onto dry hair and roots, using your fingertips to work it in and then style as desired. Start with a small amount. Add more if required.
Step 1: Shake a small amount into your palm
Step 2: Rub hands together and apply on dry hair
Step 3: Work it in and style as desired

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
